Spear.Name: Spear
Spear.Effect: A spear may not be used with dual-wielding melee weapons but may be used with a shield.

Shield.Name: Shield
Shield.Effect: +4 Def. Cannot be equipped with a Ranged Weapon that is not 'Light' or without a Melee Weapon.

Tower Shield.Name: Tower Shield
Tower Shield.Effect: +6 Def. Cannot be equipped with a Ranged Weapon that is not 'Light' or without a Melee Weapon.

Divine Hammer.Name: Divine Hammer
Divine Hammer.Effect: Advantage against Undead. Only heroes can dual-wield.

Whip.Name: Whip
Whip.Effect: +1 Atk in the first round of combat if this unit Engages.

Fighting Claws.Name: Fighting Claws
Fighting Claws.Effect: +1 Attack. This unit makes Agility Checks with Advantage.

Torch.Name: Torch
Torch.Effect: This unit does not need to make Out-Of-Sight Rolls when attempting to Engage.
